sentences.sContent: Cream the butter and sugar until the mixture is light and fluffy.
sentences.sCn: 搅拌黄油和糖，直到混合物变得松软。

synos.tran: 蓬松的；松软的；毛茸茸的；无内容的

words.tran: 绒毛；错误；无价值的东西

trans.tranCn: 绒毛似的, 披着绒毛的, 蓬松的, 愚蠢的
trans.tranOther: food that is fluffy is made soft and light by mixing it quickly so that a lot of air is mixed into it
